Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using patient's PINK1 mut fibroblasts.

Readout description.Result Description: The TMRE fluorescence intensity was significantly reduced in patient's PINK1 mut fibroblasts compared to control fibroblasts.

Biological replicates.Description: The analysis was performed on 10 different optical fields.

Technical replicates.Description: The fluorescence intensity was averaged from 80-100 randomly chosen areas.

Basic positive control.Description: Control fibroblasts were used as a positive control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Statistical significance was assessed using appropriate tests.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Fluorescence intensity comparable to control fibroblasts.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significant reduction in fluorescence intensity compared to control fibroblasts.
